message.content:
1. Adverse events were reported in droxidopa recipients.
2. The adverse events were reported in at least 3% of the recipients.
3. The recipients were part of a double-blind study.
4. One adverse event reported was a headache.
5. The occurrence of headaches was 7.4%.
6. Another adverse event reported was dizziness.
7. The occurrence of dizziness was 3.7%.

messages.content:
Statement: Adverse events reported in ≥3% of double-blind droxidopa recipients were headache (7.4%) and dizziness (3.7%).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
